summary.para: Gets the that was passed into when the was created.

param.name: riid
param.para: The globally unique identifier (GUID) for the ID3D12ProtectedResourceSession interface.

param.name: ppProtectedSession
param.para: Receives a void pointer representing the ID3D12ProtectedResourceSession interface.

summary.para: Represents a Direct3D 12 video decoder that contains resolution-independent resources and state for performing the decode operation. Inherits from and adds support for protected resources.
